page.title: 15FARM SURVEY page 6
page.content: { Hilltown Farm Hilltown Farm is 225 acres.27 fields are pasture fields and eight fields are used for growing food crops other than grass.19 fields are used for hay or silage.The crops they grow are potatoes,barley,swede and also kale. { Animals The animals they have are 61 milking cows,1 beef cow,235 breeding ewes,320 lambs for meat and 20 chickens. { Machinary 5 tractors, mower, forage harvester, baler, hay turner, hedge trimmer, muck spreader, fertilizer spreader, rotawatorand a plough. { Workers 3 people work full time on the farm and 1 person part time.
